data.name: Flower girl 2
data.detailed_description:
This game is free to play, and you can fully experience the complete plot of a flower demon.
Buy DLC to get 5 new flower demon plots. More happiness is waiting for you to explore!


[2] [introduction to the game] [/]
《Flower Girl 2 》It is a game of beautiful girl + elimination + plot combination. The story is the story of players stealing sacred objects and fleeing the flower demon country with the tears of the flower god.

◆ super cool elimination play makes you unable to stop.
◆ rich story plot.
◆ exquisite original design.
◆ increase the rhythm click play method after the first death.

【Character introduction】

Mimosa: Spring
Height: 161cm
Circumference: 95-75-95
Personality: simple, shy, blushing and curious
Representative color: Green
Flower language: repentance and politeness


Carnation: Shio
Height: 165cm
Circumference: 95-75-95
Personality: naive, lovely, cheerful and ignorant
Representative color: white
Flower language: infatuation, difference and love


Lily: Snow
Height: 167CM
Circumference: 90-80-85
Character: noble, proud and charming
Representative color: Pink
Flower language: loyalty, holiness and elegance


Phalaenopsis: Rin
Height: 172cm
Circumference: 75-90-75
Character: fragile and fragile
Representative color: Purple
Flower language: pure love


Rose: Dream
Height: 165cm
Circumference: 75-80-90
Personality: mature and sexy
Representative color: Red
Flower language: encounter by chance


Canna: Aoi
Height: 174CM
Circumference: 90-80-97
Character: IKEA female
Representative color: yellow
Flower language: a bright future

data.short_description: 《Flower Girl 2 》It is a game of beautiful girl + elimination + plot combination. The story is the story of players stealing sacred objects and fleeing the flower demon country with the tears of the flower god.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
